Package InfrastructureManager.Modules.REST

Class RESTModule

java.lang.Object
InfrastructureManager.ModuleManagement.PlatformModule
InfrastructureManager.Modules.REST.RESTModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImmutablePlatformModule
public class RESTModule
extends PlatformModule
PlatformModule that adds REST functionality to the platform.

This module allows the platform to have a global access point to communicate with external entities (apps, nodes). It provides the functionality of creating and defining a REST API, which is entirely customizable from configuration of the platform.

In this module, contrary to others, Inputs and outputs modules are not named in a hardcoded way. This is important to remember while configuring the platform to create the connections.

POST and GET IOs are named according to their own defined name, prefixed by the module name.

  • Method Details

    • configure

      public void configure​(ModuleConfigData data)
      Based on raw module data, configures the module to use it. In this case, extracts the name, baseURL and raw input and output data and creates the input and outputs with their predefined names.
      Specified by:
      configure in class PlatformModule
      Parameters:
      data - Raw module data.

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the module and additionally starts the REST server. It also activates the outputs, so the paths defined by them are valid as soon as the REST server starts
      Overrides:
      start in class PlatformModule

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the REST server and then stops the module.
      Overrides:
      stop in class PlatformModule
